name: chunk-aligned-roboports
title: Chunk aligned roboports and power poles.
author: Marximus, Graveeater
description: Resizes the roboports area to fit exactly one and half chunks, the big power pole to span one chunk and the substations to cover one quarter of a chunk. Supports some modded roboports, power poles, and substations. Forked from chunk-sized-roboports 3.2.1.
